product_description: Transform your driveway, backyard, or indoor space into a dynamic, professional-grade basketball court! The FirstAsk Portable Outdoor Basketball Hoop 44 Inch Backboard is engineered for players of all ages and skill levels. Whether it's for solo practice, friendly family competitions, or coaching the next generation, this robust and portable system delivers endless hours of active fun and skill development. Our innovative quick-lift mechanism allows you to adjust the hoop seamlessly from 5.25 ft for young beginners all the way up to the official 10 ft regulation height for teens and adults—all without any tools. Built to withstand aggressive play and harsh outdoor elements, the goal features a massive 44" L x 28" W x 6" H base that can be filled with water or sand (up to 93 lbs). For ultimate security, we include a FREE premium sandbag for added anchoring. The entire structure is reinforced with a thickened steel pole and four heavy-duty support rods, creating a rock-solid triangular foundation that barely budges, even during intense slam dunks. The 44-inch shatterproof polycarbonate backboard is built to resist yellowing, cracking, and weather damage from sun, rain, or snow. It's permanently bonded to a sturdy frame to prevent warping. The 18-inch steel rim features a professional-grade shock-absorbing spring mechanism that reduces stress on the backboard and provides a satisfying, authentic bounce on every shot. Why limit your game to one spot? Two built-in industrial-grade wheels make it easy for a single person to tilt and transport the entire system across various surfaces—from your driveway to the backyard, park, or even into the garage for indoor winter play. We know you want to start playing as soon as possible. That’s why our kit comes with a clear, step-by-step instruction manual and all necessary tools. Most customers report completing setup in 90 minutes or less, making it a simple weekend project that the whole family can help with.
